name: TC_04_02 | Verify user can create hosted zone
description: To verify, that user is able to create hosted zone
descriptionHtml: To verify, that user is able to create hosted zone

testStage.description: To verify, that user is able to create hosted zone

steps.name: Preconditions: Login as a registered user
Verify that the user is in the Hosted Zone Page
Verify that the Modal Window to create Hosted Zone Page is opening
Click on "Cancel" button.
